```{r}
tmp0 <-
  read.csv(file = 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/csv/csvData/NotTSdata/OutlineOfOutrightPurchasesOfJapaneseGovernmentSecurities.csv',
           header = T,skip = 1,fileEncoding = 'utf8',check.names = F,stringsAsFactors = F)
latestDF <- tmp0[,c(1,ncol(tmp0)-1,ncol(tmp0))]
changeDF <- latestDF[which(latestDF[,2]!=latestDF[,3]),]
username <-
  Sys.info()['user']
pathToFile <-
  paste0('C:/Users/', username,'/Desktop/pathToCSV/')
setwd(pathToFile)
fileName <-
  'defaultPath.csv'
buf <-
  read.csv(file = fileName,
           header = F,
           skip = 0,
           stringsAsFactor = F,
           check.names = F,
           fileEncoding = 'utf-8',quote = "\"")
pathOutputTOcsv <- paste0("C:/Users/", username, buf[2,1],'md/')
setwd(pathOutputTOcsv)
getwd()
mdFile <-
  paste0('olive-当面の長期国債等の買入れの運営について.md')
tags <- '日本銀行,国債買入'
dataTitle <- paste0('日本銀行:当面の長期国債等の買入れの運営について:',colnames(latestDF)[3],'分')
# md作成パート
txt <- paste0('
---
tags : [',tags,']
title : ',dataTitle,'
published : true
---\n\n')
write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = F,
            fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
txt <- paste0('- Source:日本銀行\n\n')
write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
            fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
txt <- paste0(knitr::kable(x = latestDF,
                           row.names = F,
                           format = 'html',
                           align = 'r',
                           table.attr = "id = 'amcc' width = '100%'",
                           format.args = list(big.mark = ',',drop0trailing = T),
                           escape = F),'\n')
write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
            fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
txt <- paste0('***','\n\n')
write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
            fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
txt <- paste0('#### 前月からの変更点\n\n')
write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
            fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
if(nrow(changeDF)!=0){
  txt <- paste0(knitr::kable(x = changeDF,
                             row.names = F,
                             format = 'html',
                             align = 'r',
                             table.attr = "id = 'amcc' width = '100%'",
                             format.args = list(big.mark = ',',drop0trailing = T),
                             escape = F),'\n')
  write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
              fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
}else{
  txt <- '<div style="text-align:center">なし</div>'
  write.table(x = txt,file = mdFile,append = T,
              fileEncoding = 'utf8',col.names = F,row.names = F,quote = F)
}
```
